name: a small town tavern: seven days of pals & potions
name_original: a small town tavern: seven days of pals & potions
description:
In a fantastic kingdom, you have decided to move to a new town to start your own tavern!

Make potions for and get to know the town's residents, earn money, and see your new friends go through a week of their small-town lives. 

This game was made relatively quickly as part of an application and as a result of that, it's not as feature-rich and polished as I would like it to be (especially when it comes to the quality of my writing).

Nevertheless, I tried to have the narrative work as a standalone game, and since the amount of content in this demo quickly skyrocketed, this could pretty much be considered a full, although short, game.
